targets.query: SELECT sum("value") FROM "netflow_size" WHERE ("location_org" =~ /^$Organisation$/ AND "location_country_name" =~ /^$Country$/ AND "service" =~ /^$Service$/ AND "intern_host" =~ /^$InternHost$/ AND "intern_ip" =~ /^$InternIP$/ AND "extern_group" =~ /^$ExternGroup$/ AND "extern_host" =~ /^$ExternHost$/ AND "extern_ip" =~ /^$ExternIP$/ AND "location_country_code" != 'xx' AND "service" != 'speedtest') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "location_country_name"

SELECT last("value") FROM "autogen"."trafficblocker" WHERE time > now() - 5m GROUP BY "extern_ip"::tag, "blocking_state"::tag, "blocking_reason"::tag, "blocking_list"::tag, "blocking_count"::tag ORDER BY time DESC

SELECT sum("value") FROM "netflow_size" WHERE ("location_org" =~ /^$Organisation$/ AND "location_country_name" =~ /^$Country$/ AND "service" =~ /^$Service$/ AND "intern_host" =~ /^$InternHost$/ AND "intern_ip" =~ /^$InternIP$/ AND "extern_group" =~ /^$ExternGroup$/ AND "extern_host" =~ /^$ExternHost$/ AND "extern_ip" =~ /^$ExternIP$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "location_org"

SELECT sum("value") FROM "netflow_size" WHERE ("location_org" =~ /^$Organisation$/ AND "location_country_name" =~ /^$Country$/ AND "service" =~ /^$Service$/ AND "intern_host" =~ /^$InternHost$/ AND "intern_ip" =~ /^$InternIP$/ AND "extern_group" =~ /^$ExternGroup$/ AND "extern_host" =~ /^$ExternHost$/ AND "extern_ip" =~ /^$ExternIP$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "location_country_name"

SELECT sum("value") FROM "netflow_size" WHERE ("location_org" =~ /^$Organisation$/ AND "service" =~ /^$Service$/ AND "intern_host" =~ /^$InternHost$/ AND "intern_ip" =~ /^$InternIP$/ AND "extern_group" =~ /^$ExternGroup$/ AND "extern_host" =~ /^$ExternHost$/ AND "extern_ip" =~ /^$ExternIP$/ AND "location_country_name" =~ /^$Country$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "service", "port"

SELECT "traffic_size","traffic_count" FROM "autogen"."trafficflow" WHERE "direction" = 'incoming' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "intern_host", "extern_group", "service", "location_country_name" ORDER BY time DESC

SELECT "traffic_size","traffic_count" FROM "autogen"."trafficflow" WHERE "direction" = 'outgoing' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "intern_host", "extern_group", "service", "location_country_name" ORDER BY time DESC
